name: UTF-8 BOM (Byte Order Mark) mismatch
description: LLM search pattern doesn't account for UTF-8 BOM at start of file

llm_edit.old_text:
import React from 'react';
import { useState } from 'react';

metadata.failure_reason: File starts with UTF-8 BOM (EF BB BF) that LLM search doesn't include
metadata.note: BOM makes first characters not match exactly even if they look identical
